title: Anacostia Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park              Rehabilitation Efforts  Anacostia Wetland Management       Â    News Releases - Get the latest updates. Photos & Multimedia History & Culture - Named for the people who once lived here, the park's historical connections include the siege of Washington during the War of 1812 and the Bonus Army demonstrations during the Great Depression. Nature - The Anacostia watershed is home to a surprising variety of plants and animals. Education - Lesson plans and more for teachers. Management - Anacostia Park is managed by the National Park Service.
